text: Bachelor Mountain is a mountain located in Linn County, Oregon. Bachelor Mountain is in the Willamette National Forest and stands 5,953 ft above sea level (1,814 m).https://www.summitpost.org/bachelor-mountain/154589 It is located next to Coffin Mountain. Bachelor Mountain is best known for having a trail to hike to the top. Like Coffin Mountain, it has views of the Cascade Mountain Range. The mountain used to have a fire lookout. ==References== Category:Mountains of Oregon Category:Mountains of Linn County, Oregon
title: Bachelor Mountain, Oregon
